flashcards.subject: Math
flashcards.front: What is the integral of cosx

flashcards.subject: Physics
flashcards.front: What is the moment of inertia of a disk
flashcards.back: 1/2mR^2 where R is the radius of the disk and m is the mass of the disk

flashcards.subject: History
flashcards.front: What was the date of the gulf of Tonkin incident

flashcards.subject: Physics
flashcards.front: What is Newton's Second Law of motion
flashcards.back: Force is equal to the rate of change of momentum (which equals to force multiplied by acceleration if mass is constant)

flashcards.subject: Physics
flashcards.front: What is the equation for the moment of inertia of a rod about one of its ends
flashcards.back: 1/3mL^2 where L is the length of the rod and m is the mass of the rod
